text:
All data for the column 'Projects':

- Record ID 0: [{'name': 'Large-Scale Social Media Simulation using LLMs (Prompt Engineering, AI Agent)', 'description': None, 'technologies': ['PyDantic', 'LangChain', 'Prompt Engineering', 'GPT-4o', 'Gemini', 'MCP', 'NetworkX'], 'outcome': 'Built a structured dataset from 5,000+ collected tweets using PyDantic and LangChain (Prompt Engineering, LangChain)
Simulated interactions of 400+ LLM-powered AI agents (GPT-4o, Gemini, MCP, NetworkX)
Designed complex simulations leveraging LLMs to generate and combine text with user behavioral metadata'}, {'name': 'Embodied Gaming AI Agent (Computer Vision, VLM, Agentic AI)', 'description': None, 'technologies': ['Meta SAM2', 'Gemini VLM', 'Gemini 1.5 Flash VLM'], 'outcome': 'Developed a real-time perception system (Meta SAM2, Gemini VLM) for zero-shot segmentation and tracking of
dynamic objects
Integrated Gemini 1.5 Flash VLM for scene understanding and object recognition in dynamic environments'}, {'name': 'Multi-Agent Fleet Management (Computer Vision, Agentic AI)', 'description': None, 'technologies': ['behavior trees', 'CNN'], 'outcome': 'Developed an autonomous agent using behavior trees + CNN for competitive multi-agent simulation.
Applied feature engineering, model evaluation, and real-time strategy adaptation across sequential game tasks.
Incorporated CNN-based perception module to interpret local observations, enabling the agent to prioritize between
harvesting resources, avoiding hazards, and attacking opponents depending on context.'}, {'name': 'Kaggle Sticker Sales Forecasting (Time Series) - Top 5% among 2,500+ teams', 'description': None, 'technologies': ['XGBoost', 'Transformers'], 'outcome': 'Combined ML, deep learning, and statistical methods with feature engineering for demand forecasting.
Built an ensemble model (XGBoost + statistical methods + Transformers) with automated hyperparameter tuning'}, {'name': 'AI-Powered Automated Trading System (Reinforcement Learning)', 'description': None, 'technologies': ['Scrapy', 'Airflow', 'MongoDB', 'GCP', 'PPO', 'A2C', 'reinforcement learning'], 'outcome': 'Trained reinforcement learning agents (PPO, A2C) for predictive trading, achieving a Sharpe ratio of 1.2'}]
